content.detailedDescription: This is being reported for someone else.  my mother had a co-worker today tell her that she saw a ufo last night (11-8-10) that appeared to be a very large glowing red light with smaller red lights moving around it. she said that it was just sitting there and then noticed 3 aircraft approaching or following it.  she then said that it started moving in one direction slowly and then stopped for a second and then moved the opposite direction.  it stopped again and then disappeared. this women is located in doney park just east of flagstaff and at the base of mount elden and the san francisco peaks. i do not know what direction in the sky this took place.  i have told my mom to have the lady report her sighting here.. so hopefully she will.  there is also a report of someone seeing 8 foot tall creatures on the mountain here on the 7th of november. this ladies husband also saw the event and had binoculars with him. he believed it to be a military exercise while his wife did not think so.  there is no military installation housing aircraft anywhere near flagstaff.
content.summary: Large red light followed by jets

content.detailedDescription:
The sighting i am about to describe occurred many years ago, it is difficult to estimate exactly when but some time during the 1980's is a reasonable guess.

i was traveling south on 525w, a road that is 7-8 miles west of columbus, near the intersection of what is now goeller blvd. it was a warm summer evening, probably near 7:30pm or so. 

as i approached the intersection i noticed what i thought was a very bright star on the western horizon. the horizon in this case is a very high bluff. i thought to myself "gosh that's a bright star." and wondered if it was a planet. after driving another 100 yards or so i again looked at the star and it seemed much closer. the "star" then began to split as two like sized units emerged from the original one and took up positions to the left and right of the initial one. the two outside units then each had another like sized unit emerge from them and position themselves further to the outside. there was now a fleet of five units flying in formation from west to east. the five units were some distance apart, flying in parallel.

since there was no one behind me i got out of my car and watched as the units streaked across the sky. i remember being amazed how fast they were flying and thinking to myself that we don't have anything that flies that fast. after a short time they disappeared  from my view to the east. trees blocked my view so i could not see them disappear over the eastern horizon.

the above episode only took a few minutes. i remember thinking ufo's are for real. it was truly awe inspiring. the actual tme is difficult to estimate with accuracy but a good guess would be 3-4 minutes from the time i first saw the "star" to the five units disappeared to the east.
content.summary: Bright white star appeared on horizon that split into three separate star-like units. the two outside units each then split into two units, bringing the total to five. all five star-like units flew in parallel across the sky .

content.detailedDescription: I was near the house and playing when i saw it my grandpa told me that in area 51 they have ufos and when i saw it i just know it. i tried to call the cops but they never came. the ufo was moving very slow and going around and around i think it was looking for something but the last i saw it was when it stop at a house and i saw a person go fly up and i was scaryed because that was my friends dad. after that it just zoomed like so fast. i have info on them and i know the goverments secrets on area 51 and all. one day i was face to face with a alien when i was 8.
content.summary: Moving slow i think looking for something

content.detailedDescription: I had been watching out my window for any signs of showers from the hartley2 comet. my window faces directly north and there are 2 bright stars close together that i use as a reference point.  just when i started to close the curtain and go to bed. i saw a bright flash of orange right next to the two stars. at first i thought it was a fireball but after thinking about it,it seemed to strange to be a fireball. like i said it was a fiery bright orange on top and it was a perfect up and down strip of orange with a brighter star shaped or fireworks shaped light on the bottom of the strip, below that it appeared to be dripping orange fire.It came straight down from no where and disappeared just as quick. if it had been a fireball it should have had some arc to it or some kind of tail. this thing just appeared like it just dropped down then it was gone. the more i have thought about it it kinda looked like a big giant orange door with fire more like fireworks and something dripping from that.The color was consistent all over the thing,a bright orange with tinges of yellow on the fireball part and orange drips from the bottom.I have tried to sketch it a few times but just can't get it right. the size had to be enormous. the area it appeared over would be talking rock or ellijay.
content.summary: While watching for meteors from hartley2  something strange showed up in the northern sky

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my kitchen at around 10:20 am in my house in the hollywood area. i heard a very loud sound of airplanes, like the sound of fighter planes. i had my door open on my deck so i walked out to look. sure enough there were 2 fighter planes flying in formation going from west to east. as the 2 fighter planes flew out of sight i noticed that high above the altitude of the planes, and moving in the opposite direction of the fighter planes (east to west) 6 pinkish white dots of light, (they looked like bright stars but in the daylight) at first they were in no specific formation, then they gathered into a "v" shape with one of the dots kind of far off to the side (south of the formation) they broke up again and moved quite quickly in and out of the "v" formation but staying in pairs. then they seemingly changed direction and started flying back toward the east, but it seemed that they were also gaining altitude and getting further away. i tried to get it on my flip camera but they were so high up that they only look like pixels on my camera. it was so frustrating that no one in my house had binoculars because i needed to see it more clearly, i couldn't explain or believe what i was seeing! i watched with my hands cupped around my eyes for about 7 or 8 minutes till they just climbed so high that they were no longer visible.
content.summary: 6 round dots of pinkish light in a "v" formation scattering after 2 fighter planes flew past

content.detailedDescription: I'd just picked my little boy up from nursery when i saw a  bright white star travelling south east. its motion was not smooth, it seemed to slow down and speed up as it travelled. it also seemed to be travelling i nan arc, bending more east as it went. i watched it and remember thinking that it was below the scattered mid level cloud although in the end it seemed to dissapear behind the clur - or just fade... it was dark with only a slight blue tinge left in the west. i tried to finm it on my mobile phone but couldn't see it through the view finder so not sure if it came out yet.
content.summary: Saw a bright white star travelling south east. its motion was not smooth and was also in an arc.

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i had finished a short hike off of sand flats road and were returning home.  we turned east along sand flats road from a side road and were directly facing the moab rim.  i immediately saw two slowly moving objects going from south to north, just below the top of the rim and directly opposite our truck.  they attracted my attention because of their movement, and they were lighter in color than the red/orange rock of the cliffs.  they appeared to be moving very slowly at a constant velocity, slower than what i would expect from aircraft.  i thought that they were perhaps ultralights.  my husband is an ex-pilot, so i asked my husband to stop the truck, and we both got out to observe the objects.  the sun was behind rim at this time,so we were not looking directly into the sun.  the objects were flying in what my husband called an "echelon" formation," with one object flying slightly behind and off flank to the other.  there was a distinct separation between the objects.  their relative positions did not change for the entire time of observation, which we estimated to be approximately 2 minutes; however, we did not time the period with a watch.  my husband thought that the object to the rear was slightly larger (nearer) than the lead object, putting them in a right echelon formation.  i was not able to discriminate between sizes of the two objects.  my husband was certain that we were not observing ultralights because the objects maintained constant relative postions for the entire observation time.

since the top of the rim has some irregularities, i thought that we may be able to see the objects' silouettes at some point since they were just below the rim. from our viewpoint,though, the objects travelled just below the  top of the rim for the entire 2 minutes.  at one point, however, sunlight from a break in the rocks illuminated the two objects, which then appeared as two bright shining points of light, so they seemd to be metallic.  the illumination was brief, perhaps two seconds as they continued northward along the cliff face.  we were able to observe the objects until the cliff face dropped suddenly in elevation. at that point, the objects immeidately disappeared against the sky, south of the portal.   

we were able to locate our position relative to the objects on topo maps when we got home. we are fairly confident of the distances we estimated.    

in summary:

feelings: we agreed that we could not identify the objects.  we also agreed to make this report because we hope that someone in the moab valley may have also seen them and could provide insight/explanation.

shape of objects: our elevation in the truck was approximately the same as the objects, so we were looking from a side view.  roughly diamond-shaped, but flat on the bottom; a skewed trapezoidal shape; the vertical dimension was offset to a vertical centerline, as viewed from the side, so they were slightly assymmetric.  

color: my husband described them as light gray.  i could tell that they were lighter in color than the background rocks but can not definitely describe them as gray.  

texture: to me, although the outline of their shapes was definitely discernable, they seemd a little "fuzzy." 

distance from viewpoint to objects:  approximately 4.57 miles, as estimated froma 7.5" topo, sand flats road to cliff face.

distance travelled along front of moab rim during approximate 2 minute time period: 2.2 miles.

size of objects: we both agreed that if we held a hand out in front of us, each object would be the size of half our thumbnails.  using the distance from our position to the rim, we extrapolated tha size of the objects and estimate each one to be about 200+ feet long.

apparent velocity: approximately 60 mph.
content.summary: Two distinct objects moving slowly south to north below moab rim above moab.

content.detailedDescription:
The night of nov. 8th my son  came into the house and stated mom you have to see this it just showed up in the sky. i observed in the eastern sky a bright colored object that  was changing colors as we watched. not just primary colors many differant hues. i went in the house grabbed my 7d canon camera with the basic telephoto lens and started shooting. i took about 11 shots then went inside to get binoclars.When i returned the object was gone.
 last night i went out at the same time to see if it was there and it wasnt so i knew it could not have been a star. at 11:15 my friends son came over to look at the photos i took. i had to go out to get something out of my car. i turned around and it had appeared again.  this time it alomst seemed to respond when i used a flash on the camera i would flash and it would flash a bright white. we watched it for over and hour and once again it just vanished.  i have 3 other witness from last nights episode. my son, and daughter, and his friend. i am anxious to find out what we saw. i have pictures, and would be able to email to someone. 
  i have taken one of the photos and cleaned it up. we can see what looks to be a triangle image, with a vapor trail at one of the sides. the series of photos show again green, purple, yellow, red, teal green, bright green, and it leaves with out a trace just like someone turned off a light.
content.shape: Boomerang,   Cone,   Circle,   Egg,   Flash,   Star-like,   Triangle
content.summary: Star like light that changed colors rapidly while stationary in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
As i walked out of basement this am, i noticed 2 star like objects in the morning sky to the west.
i thought they were just some bright stars, then they moved...
objects were very bright, as i watched them they started to move in a southerly direction.
one object moved closer to the next. as they got closer to each other they dissapeared.
freaked me out.
it was like they knew i saw them.
they looked just like stars, but they weren't.
content.summary: 2 star like objects in wnw sky very bright were together than disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
This is not a ufo report.

this data is submitted with regard to mufon case 26465. the skies in central mi have been crystal clear since sunday, 7 nov 2010. as a result i have been out plane watching both day and night. in conjunction with this 90% of the arriving flights at mbs, freeland, mi have landed on rwy 05 after making their approach from the sw chicage arrivals or right base 05 from detroit. many of these flights are b-757's that appear to hover in the sky (from a distance) especially when down to 2,100 ft. approach altitude.

there are (2) lifeguard helicopters that operate from downtown hospitals located in saginaw, mi approx. 7.0 mi dme heading 145 deg. from mbs. both birds are rarely on the ground. both have a very bright red light on top that alternates with one on the bottom of the fuselage. both rarely fly above 2,500 agl and more often than not between 1,200 to 1,800 agl. both are modified bo-105's. these (2) birds alone can explain away half of the sightings here.

re: case 26465 the dates are off by 24 hours but, from 17:55 hrs eastern thru 18:15 hrs eastern the night of 9 nov. 2010 i listened to my scanner tuned to mbs approach 126.45 while a uh-64 (probably military) helicopter made a 25 mile approach to mbs from the sw on an approx. 050 deg heading while vectoring to land on rwy 05 midfield. the uh-64 did report his speed was 140 mph and i assume he was down to 2,100 ft agl. two other commercial aircraft were also in the pattern and as a result the uh-64 was directed off course to a northerly heading while yielding to the other craft. in short, just prior to landing the uh-64 would have flown out into dense, wooded, back country for a couple minutes before resuming rwy 05 vectors.

i will add that military aircraft use mbs for training simulated bomb runs regularly. the past two weeks there has been a glut of miang a-10 warthogs doing the deck then bugging out.
content.summary: Uh-64 helicopter landed at mbs freeland, mi

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving on 74/23 heading west towards bryson city, and i saw something moving slowly and smoothly just above the tree line to my right, heading the opposite direction. i remember thinking that it was surveying something, but realized it wasn't something i hadn't seen before when i saw the green square lights underneath it. it went over my car, and i saw it for a minute looking up over my steering wheel through my windshield, and was so completely caught off-guard i did not stop. i tried looking in my rear view and side mirrors but did not see it again. it was a triangle, with i believe 4 square green lights on each side (could be more or less, but the green lights were definitely square). there were also red lights, but i don't remember them being of any significant shape.
i was going appox. 60 mph, i was in the left lane and there was a car next to me. i was not going under a bridge and it did not look like a helicopter. i did not have time to turn my music down so i do not know if it was loud or quiet.
content.summary: Triangular object with green square lights and smaller red lights

content.detailedDescription: Alot of wierd things have happend to me threw out my life so ima just give u this 1 story and if u could ask the right person what they think about it or if they think im bein followed. its about ufo's, well when i was 16 me and a friend went to the charles river in boston ma after school. to smoke ciggars(yes we were to young for that and it was stupid to smoke, but we did it any way) it was about7pm when we lit r first ciggars when all of a suddn we just r waking up in the same position on the bench we were sitting on, our butts were at the end of the bench and the back of our heads were resting on the back of the bench(kinda in a looking up position if u could imagine). we both saw a craft that look to be really high above us and did not look areodynamic at all moving from over charles river to over cambridge fast. we look at are watches it was 3:30am. then we both ran home. since then ive seen 15 ufo's threw out the years till 2010 . the question i have for this story would be where did the 8hrs go and am i seeing the same ufo following me or are these ufo's all different?
content.summary: Big loss of time possible boston ma abduction

content.detailedDescription:
This event is currently ongoing as of this writing(11-10-2010), and has been every night since the first of september 2010,.Multiple craft with as many as twelve at once. they both respond to control tower light gun signals and move rapidly away from any approach of a simple 20mw red laser pointer, and that to our amazement. we have,thru the use of a directional parabolic microphone actually recorded what has been said to be "non-terrestial". this latter evidence was recorded by mistake, as the person whom captured it was actually trying to record coyote howlings at night. i have eight to nine hours of video,around three hundred photos, showing three distinct types of craft. also have around fifteen witness willing to swear to the above events, and will provide you with all photos,audio, and video you want. we simply want to know what the hell these things are,and why are they here every night, beginning typically at around 6:30 p.M. lasting until 2:00a.M. there has been three landings witnessed and photographed. digital and film type cameras were used. what do these beings want, why is there no media coverage of an event as amazing as this is, can we carry on a dialogue with these beings and if yes, whats the best method? are they dangerous, they ,at least i think they can tell whether a person is armed or not, and respond accordingly. now back to the beginning, i am self employed , i flight instruct, and have a f.A.A. certificated repair station, and as with something as unusual as aviation, 29 years in the trade, i have seen every variation of aircraft ,helicoptr, in any imagineable configuration, fire, hail storm ,tornado, ect. these are not any terrestial craft that i have ever seen. their not blimps,not diribles, they are as you said,ufo,s. iwas not the one who saw these craft initially, but overheard conversation late one night and walked out on the tarmac finding at thirty peopl.I ask what they were doing and the first guy carefully explained gow to mix coca-cola  for my kiddos. i hope some resolution can be had of this matter,
*(wit's name and phone number deleted--cms/sg) any time night or day.
content.summary: Round typical flying saucer shape.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my room, watching tv, when i heard this sound, quiet at first but growing louder. it was a sound like i've never heard before. the closest thing i can think of to describe it would be the sound of wind blowing through something with the sound raising in pitch as well as volume. i went out the door that's connected to my room, that faces northwest. i caught just a glimpse of an enormous dark rectangular object that looked like it was the end of something larger that i could not see. it immediately disappeared over the tree line, and i didn't get a very good look at it. it was far larger than any aircraft i've ever seen. i didn't see any lights specifically, but it was definitely illuminated somehow, it seemed from the bottom. i didn't know what to think the thing was, i've never seen or heard anything quite like it. my heart started beating faster when i heard the sound, and my heart was racing for a couple minutes after the event. even now as i type my heart is starting to beat a little faster. after it disappeared i stood outside for a bit longer, but i didn't see or hear anything else. after i came in i got on the computer and told a couple friends what i saw, then started filing this report about ten minutes after it happened.
content.summary: Heard an odd noise so i looked outside and saw something pass over tree line.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from mtsu and right before i got to the intersection in front of the veteren's administartion the object was hovering, motionless, far away on the side of the street the va is on. i watched it for a few minutes as i drove by slowing down. i passed it and decided to turn around, but it was gone when i got back to the intersection.
content.summary: Large and either triangular or rectangular, with a panel of light, maybe six or eight on the side i could see. dark colored.

content.detailedDescription: As i pulled into my driveway this evening i just happenned to look up which i never do anymore as there is nothing to look at.  until tonight.  i have lived in canada for 18 years now and have never seen a sight like this.  at this very time outside of my home you can see approx 50 objects of the likes i have never seen.  3 of the objects are low enough to give definition of its shape and and the rest are high.  normally you would say balloon or aircraft.  however, folks i have never seen an aircraft or balloon that can emit these kinds of lights.  they are defiantly out there moving around yet clearly in the formation of a road and they are encompassing an spherical area so that they can clearly be seen.   well take note i have seen it and it is exciting yet unnerving to say the least
content.summary: Aligned like a roadway.  few crafts were low and plainly visible to naked eye

content.detailedDescription:
I received a call from a friend in florida, who lives east coast south of the cape, half way down the state, two evenings in a row, "huge" donut shaped object above normal flight of passenger jets.  don't know how high up.  doesn't move...Second night not quite in the same location as previous night.  lights on one end, i believe he said red and white and one white glowing light from center.  object very clear in the sky.  nothing mentioned on news.  i asked him to film if he sees it on the 9th.

this is all i have for now.  didn't now if anyone else reported this.

thank you
content.summary: Very large donut shape

content.detailedDescription: I am 24 years old now(2010), when this event occured i was about 13 or 14 years old, brother and neighbors about the age of 9 or 10 years old. we all lived on old stage rd. in valley grande, al. we were playing baseball, across the street from my house, in the neighbor's yard. during the game i noticed the object hovering and made sure everyone saw it too. we had no clue what it was, so we walked closer to the object and it seemed to fly away from us, so we started to chase it, it seemed to play along with us and then it flew higher. the object was about 10 ft. in air(when spotted), small(no more than 3 ft. in diameter), grey and no sound came from the object. at one point it almost even seemed like we could catch the object. when it rose high enough that we could not catch it, we just stood in the yard staring at the object while it slowly rose and eventually disappeared. we ran in the house to tell the neighbor's mother of what happened and of course she most likely did not believe us. i have always believed this to be an unworldly object, because the whole event was unbelievable. the only ify part about it to me, is the object was small and i have never heard a sighting of a ufo that size. curious if there has ever been another sighting similar to this one.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Very small ufo hovered over while my brother, nieghbors and i played baseball. we noticed it chased for a little while until flying off.

content.detailedDescription: I was dropping my friend off at his house and it was about 6:20 pm. it was pretty dark outside and i was heading home. i was making a turn and when i looked both ways i did a double take because i saw something weird and i thought it was a streetlight. it was an orange-ish fireball ascending into the sky. it got dimmer and turned into a single ball of light. i was freaking out and i called my friend to tell her what i saw and while i was talking to her the object jumped to the other side of the sky in an instant. it was a fireball like before and when it dimmed, it looked like three horizontal lights and it shot off into the sky.
content.summary: Fireball ascends into the sky.

content.detailedDescription: On october 17th 2008 at about 8:30p.M. me and my family were watching t.V. in my bedroom when we heard the roar of a jet and it sounded very low to the ground. my wife told me to go see what it was so i got up and walked outside and could see two jets with blinking lights right behind a glowing orb. i thought the object that was glowing was a refueling airplane maybe with no blinking lights but then it just dropped about 300 feet down in 1 second and flew back towards the jets that were chasing it. it flew under them and slowly became dim as it flew west and then disappeared. the two jets then headed east in the direction they were going when they were chasing this glowing orb. i was in shock i ran inside and was yelling to my family i seen a u.F.O. . i could not sleep that night and ever since then i'm always looking up at the sky.
content.summary: I watched two jets chase a glowing light.

content.detailedDescription:
6 days a week my job is making virtual tours. i was at 559 old hwy 28 taking mountain view pictures from the clients deck. air was 0 mph & there was "no" sound, very quiet there. i didn't see any thing strange. but when i got back to my office, checking the pictures, i saw something blured in the picture taken from the deck to the mountains. i shoot at 3mp because of internet use, so as you enlarge it is not sharp. but i blew it up & messed with max shadows to darken it, then with highlights, you can see the shape of a triangle, back to back.

the pic time will say 10:53am, but it's really 9:53am. 

didn't use this picture in my show, but you can watch it to get an idea of the land & mountains at the back of the house. if it was a plane, the picture would have been sharp & clear. 

*(link moved to additional evidence section below--cms/sg.

thanks for reading this,

*(wit's name deleted--cms/sg)
content.summary: Never saw it but camera did.

content.detailedDescription:
Date: march 21, 1993
time: 9pm
location: texas highway 118
coordinates: 29���21'11.13"n 103���31'41.95"w
weather conditions: clear


this is the first time i choose to write about the incident.

my college roommate and i choose to go for an afternoon road trip. we were driving to back to alpine, texas on highway 118 driving north. from the time we left study butte, texas we noticed a red light in the north eastern direction in the mountains. my roommate ( i will not divulge his name at this time, i do have his consent, and do not know his current location ) commented to me it was a fire, and i reply, ���with fires you will only see light from the edges���. as we got closer we could clearly identify the shape as a parabola as it was hovering in air about 500ft to 1000ft, and a solid bright red glowing light that covered the complete under belly of the object. 

i stopped the truck to relieve myself and to watch the object. as i fixed my eyes on a nearby electrical pole i could see the object moving from the left to right. their was no sound associated with the movement of the object. the object was at least 500ft to 1000ft in width. at that time, we both got back into the truck and drove to the north back to alpine. i felt fear during the sighting, and wanted to leave the area as soon i could. 

my roommate keep a strict record of the time, and started to tune in fm and am radio stations from alpine and odessa, texas. there was none of the standard phenomenon that is reported with such a sighting such as radio, electrical, or time distortion.

on our way back to alpine, we both noticed an owl sitting on the fence, and we both knew what the owls represents in sightings. the hair on the back of our necks stood up.  as we approached the boarder patrol check point we found it vacant.

i have no clue on the origins of this craft we both saw, i���ve was raised around aviation, and know this was nothing i have ever seen before or after.
content.summary: Soild glowing red parabola hoovering

content.detailedDescription:
Date: november 1, 2010
location: scarborough, ontario, canada
time: object start: 3:13pm (15:13) object end: 3:18pm (15:18) 
duration: approximately 5 minutes
helicopter start: 5:25pm (17:25) duration: 5min 
object direction in relation to witness: north
object inclination: 85 degrees (almost overhead)
object motion: clockwise rotation 

i am not the witness. i have interviewed the witness and have put together a preliminary analysis of the sighting.

the object was rotating silently clockwise.
environment canada weather reports and radar data for that day say it was blue skies, perfect visibility, and a 7km/h wind from the south east blowing north west.

object was observed for 5 min, stationary in ground motion, then vanished.
various star-like secondary objects also present with ufo.

a black helicopter (later matched to a canadian military bell oh-58 kiowa helicopter) arrived at 5:25pm that day, and was also photographed with star like object in frame.
content.summary: Shapeshifting "worm" like structure with clockwise rotation / black helicopter

content.detailedDescription:
On thursday, october 31st (halloween night), 1968 at approximately 8:00 pm, i was trick-or-treating with my oldest brother (who was 17 at the time). we were about one block from home in a residential neighborhood across from a large park where we grew up playing softball and football, when a strange sensation came over me that we were being watched - followed by an overwhelming urge to look around and then to look up above us.  there, approximately 1 - 200 feet above us was a circular/disc-shaped ufo that had white lights around its circumference - along with dark circular shaped windows/openings that were interspersed evenly between the lights.  the craft made no sound as the lights went on and off in progressive fashion around the craft's circumference - never stopping.  after standing transfixed watching the craft for about 15 seconds, i looked down to tap my brother on the shoulder and to tell him to look up, and when i did - and we both looked up - the craft was gone - and again without any sound whatsoever.
at the height estimated, the craft appeared to be approximately 50 to 75 feet in diameter and was silver/metallic in color.  no propulsion system, engines or flames were seen as it hovered motionless above us.
content.summary: Circular/disc-shaped ufo obeserved in arlington heights, illinois

content.detailedDescription:
I saw three triangular shaped craft flying in a triangle formation from east to west. i would say altitude was around 3,000 feet. i was in the ealing area.

the unusual thing about them was the light, there were no single points of light or blinking green and red navigation lights. instead, each of the triangles showed off a diffuse, subdued orange light, which was triangular in shape. possibly, they might have been reflecting back the city lights below.

they moved really fast across the sky (about 9 seconds to pass out of view) and before they went out of sight, one of the triangles changed position so that there were now three triangles in a diagonal line.

this area is near heathrow airport and there was a jet from there climbing out over the area, which made a lot of noise, so i'm unable to say if these craft were silent or not, but i did not discern any noise coming from them like fighter jets would make.

just puzzled by this, i see aircraft every day, but these were nothing like anything i have seen and the strangest thing about them was the diffuse orange light.
content.summary: Three orange coloured triangular craft flying in triange formation over london, england

content.detailedDescription:
I am an early riser, always up by 2:30-3:00am. was sitting on front porch having a cigarette when i noticed red lights flashing one at a time from right to left in rapid succession (looking west). there were about 20-24 lights and they were very large. i was awe struck because the lights were telling me the object was at least a half mile wide. i believe the lights were going in sequence around the craft (even though i couldn't see the back of it) because after the red light finished on the left side there was a delay of about 2 seconds before the right to left sequence started again. i saw this event repeat about 4-5 times and then the sky went dark. just about 3-5 seconds later it started again, but this time the lights were bright white strobes and there was not a pattern, just random.  the strobes were very bright and really lit up the night. all this time i was in awe and never took my eyes off of it.  then it moved slowly over the ocean (south from my location) and disappeared vertically at a rapid pace. i think it went in to space. also, it made no sound whatsoever.

but what was really weird was that a missile (i think) was fired from the south (in the direction of the ocean) as if to shoot it down. i've seen missile launches from vafb and they move very slow in comparison to what i saw follow the ufo. this was like an interceptor missile, very-very fast.
content.summary: Saw red lights in western sky then white strobe lights, then it went up vertically until it disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting at the traffic light at west river drive and lamoreaux waiting to make a left turn.  i saw the disc shape silver object high in the sky over the ballpark.  it just stayed in the same spot, not moving.  i had to turn the corner and after turning i caught sight that it was still there.  after i parked in the parking lot on the corner i walked out to the street but it was gone.
content.summary: Saw silver disc shape high in sky over fifth third ballpark

content.detailedDescription: On monday, may 10th, 2010 my oldest son came home to tell me he had seen lightning while outside biking with his friends. i told him he must have been mistaken as it was a warm beautiful sunny evening with only 2 or three very small white cumulus clouds visible in the sky - and that they were at an approximate altitude of 25 - 30,000 feet or higher.  he then asked me to come out and take a look for myself - which i did.  i had a couple of errands to run, so i took my oldest son who was 15 and my younger son who is 11 with me while i ran the errands.  after running two quick errands, on the way back home, my oldest son pointed to one of the small clouds directly above us at the approximate altitude previously stated and he told me to look at the cloud.. which i did.  this one small white cloud was becoming transparent as its color changed and flashed green, blue, purple, red, yellow and back to green again as is started its intermittent flashing through the cloud.  with every flash and color change, the cloud became transparent and an extremely large (my estimate would be at least a half mile long or longer) cigar/cylinder-shaped object could be seen by myself and my two sons.  we pulled into a parking lot and watched the 'show' for about 15 minutes - and in total - the event lasted at least 45 minutes from the time my son first came home to tell me about it.  after watching the event together for 15 minutes we observed a large aircraft pass under the unknown cigar/cylinder-shaped object - at which point there was a bright purple flash and the object was no longer visible and the cloud dissapated. it should be notated that the sides of the object reflected and changed color every time there was a color flash change in the cloud itself.  the object had defined perimeter outlines and alternately appeared solid, changed or reflected colors multiple times and also appeared transparent at times as well.  the object was at least a quarter to half mile long - and probably longer, as a large (and possibly) commercial airplane flew beneath the object and was dwarfed by the size of the object - which was at least 20 to 25 times longer than the aircraft beneath it.  the aircraft was closer to us visually and appeared to be several thousand feet below (therefore a lower altitude than) the object we saw.
content.summary: Very large cigar/cylinder-shaped ufo over crystal lake

content.detailedDescription:
First of all i want to start by saying i am not crazy, tonight at about 8pm my boyfriend and i were going to his house in saginaw county, mi and were going down a somewhat country road to get there, the road had houses on it but we were the only car on the road (usually theres at least one other car we pass on the way there). while on the road i saw a light in the sky that was far away that looked like a weird star or planet or something i noticed it because of its strange colors and after he saw it we started arguing about what it was, it wasn't moving but he said it was a plane and so i pulled over to prove it wasn't moving, it then started moving back and forth so we were both wrong and we saw a plane pass below it (it was definitely a plane). i started getting a bad feeling in my stomach, kind of like anxiety and said we should go so we continued driving down the road when (and this is the part where i swear i'm not crazy, we both saw exactly the same thing) three lights in a row came out of nowhere and started coming directly towards us. it was flying very low, too low to be a plane and almost in the tree line, at this point i was the most scared i have ever been in my life, it was not stopping and my boyfriend was telling me not to stop the car but i turned it around as fast as i could and started going as fast as i could the opposite way, i was telling him to call 911 and he got out my phone and had the number dialed but didn't call and i was so scared my whole body was shaking, we were about two miles from the main road. i was near tears when we got to the main road and once we got there he tried to say it could have been another plane, so i insisted we go to the airport, once there he went in and talked to a sheriff and airport worker who said that the only flight that came in was from chicago, this all happened before 8:30pm. we then concluded that there was no way it could have been a plane, (my boyfriend is very rational and level-headed) after the airport he told me that while we were driving, whatever had been in front of us was driving directly next to us less than a quarter mile away, he got a vague look at it and said it had no wings or tail, when i was driving i was going about 70mph and slowed to about 55mph when coming to a stop sign, he said it stayed directly next to us the entire time. this was the most terrifying experience i have ever had and i almost can't believe it happened.
     on a side note, earlier that evening i found out my blood type was b- and that if a woman gets pregnant and that baby has a + blood type the mom could reject it, so we had been talking about that and while looking ufo sightings today i stopped for a bit to get more info on my blod type and found a article saying that most people who are abducted by aliens have b- or other - blood types; not that i think i was abducted it was just a weird incident and that information made it a little weirder... it would be nice to get a bit more info on that.
content.summary: Red, amber, green/blue lights followed by 3 circular white lights, saginaw county, mi

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 1:40 am on saturday, march 1st 2008, as i was watching a show on television, my two dogs both awakened and started whining and lightly barking for no apparent reason. i let them both out to our fenced in back yard and (together) they ran to the middle of the yard looked up and started barking more loudly. i tried calling them back inside - but they wouldn't come in. i then went outside to get them and both dogs were sitting in the snow barking at something (i thought) was in one of the trees, but there was nothing there.  then in the distance, up in the sky over algonquin, illinois a very large oval-shaped fireball ufo appeared out of nowhere, hovered in place for over a minute or so, which gave me time to further notice actual flames being emitted from the object, yet the object emitted no sound whatsoever. the longer it remained stationary, the stranger the whole thing seemed. then, and without warning - or even a sound - the object sped off at a great speed horizontally to the southeast and was literally out of sight within 2 seconds.  the object was easily a mile or two away from where i live, yet it was large enough for me to see the flames coming off it, so how large an object it was - i can't say, but it was big enough for me to see that much detail from a fairly long distance.
content.summary: Football-shaped ufo / fireball over crystal lake / algonquin illinois
